mapper.select: select a.*,(select staff_name from staff where fdid = a.creator) creator_name, (select company_name from company where fdid = a.create_company_id) create_company_name, (select company_name from company cp ,staff2company scc where cp.fdid = scc.company_id and scc.staff_id = a.fdid) company_name, (select fdid from company cp ,staff2company scc where cp.fdid = scc.company_id and scc.staff_id = a.fdid) company_id from staff a where a.fdid = #{fdid}

select a.*,(select staff_name from staff aa where aa.fdid = a.creator) creator_name, (select company_name from company where fdid = a.create_company_id) create_company_name, (select company_name from company cp ,staff2company scc where cp.fdid = scc.company_id and scc.staff_id = a.fdid) company_name, (select fdid from company cp ,staff2company scc where cp.fdid = scc.company_id and scc.staff_id = a.fdid) company_id from staff a where a.staff_number =#{staff_number} and isdeleted='0'
select a.fdid,a.role_name,a.parent_id from roles a,staff2role sl where 1=1 and a.fdid = sl.role_id and sl.staff_id = #{fdid}
select a.fdid,a.postion_name,a.desp from postion a,staff2postion sp where 1=1 and a.fdid = sp.postion_id and sp.staff_id = #{fdid}

select mm.* from staff2authority sa,authority au ,authority2menu am ,menu mm where 1=1 and sa.authority_id = au.fdid and au.fdid = am.authority and am.menu_id = mm.fdid and au.isdeleted = mm.isdeleted and mm.isdeleted ='0' and sa.staff_id = #{fdid}

select mm.* from staff2role sr,roles rl ,role2authority ra,authority au ,authority2menu am ,menu mm where 1=1 and sr.role_id = rl.fdid and rl.fdid = ra.role_id and ra.authority_id = au.fdid and au.fdid = am.authority and am.menu_id = mm.fdid and mm.isdeleted = au.isdeleted and mm.isdeleted = rl.isdeleted and rl.isdeleted ='0' and sr.staff_id = #{fdid}

select mm.* from staff2group sg ,staff_group sgg,role2group rg,roles rl ,role2authority ra,authority au,authority2menu am ,menu mm where sg.staff_id = sgg.fdid and sgg.fdid = rg.group_id and rg.role_id = ra.role_id and ra.authority_id = au.fdid and au.fdid = am.authority and am.menu_id = mm.fdid and mm.isdeleted = au.isdeleted and mm.isdeleted = rl.isdeleted and rl.isdeleted = sgg.isdeleted and sgg.isdeleted ='0' and sg.staff_id=#{fdid}
mapper.update: update staff set password = #{temp_str3} where fdid = #{fdid}
mapper.select: select a.* from company a where isdeleted='0' connect by a.parent_id = prior a.fdid start with a.parent_id =#{fdid} order by company_order asc
select a.* from company a where fdid =#{fdid}
select a.* from company a where isdeleted='0' connect by a.parent_id = prior a.fdid start with a.parent_id =#{fdid} union select * from company where fdid = #{fdid}
select a.* from data_dict a where isdeleted='0' connect by a.parent_id = prior a.fdid start with a.parent_id = #{parent_id} order by num asc

select ah.* from staff a,staff2authority sa ,authority ah where a.fdid = sa.staff_id and ah.fdid = sa.authority_id and ah.isdeleted ='0' and a.fdid = #{staff_id} union select ah.* from staff2role sr,roles rl,role2authority ra ,authority ah where sr.role_id = ra.role_id and rl.fdid = ra.role_id and rl.isdeleted='0' and ra.authority_id = ah.fdid and ah.isdeleted='0' and sr.staff_id = #{staff_id} union select ah.* from staff2group sg ,staff_group sgg ,role2group rg ,roles rl ,role2authority ra,authority ah where sg.group_id = sgg.fdid and sgg.isdeleted='0' and sgg.fdid = rg.group_id and rg.role_id = rl.fdid and rl.fdid = ra.role_id and rl.isdeleted='0' and ra.authority_id = ah.fdid and ah.isdeleted ='0' and sg.staff_id = #{staff_id}

select a.* from operation a where a.foreign_id = #{temp_str1} and a.isdeleted ='0' and a.isdeleted = a.iscontrol union select a.* from operation a,authority2operation ao where a.fdid = ao.operation_id and a.foreign_id = #{temp_str1} and a.isdeleted ='0' and ao.authority in
#{item}
select a.* from data_dict a where a.dict_value =#{dict_value}
select * from data_dict a where a.isdeleted ='0' and a.parent_id = #{parent_id} order by num asc

select a.*, (select staff_name from staff where fdid = a.creator) staff_name, (select count(1) from staff2group sg,staff sf where sg.staff_id = sf.fdid and sf.isdeleted='0' and sg.group_id = a.fdid) temp_int1 from staff_group a where a.isdeleted ='0'

select a.*,(select count(1) from staff2role sr ,staff sf where sf.fdid = sr.staff_id and sr.role_id = a.fdid and sf.isdeleted='0') temp_int1, (select count(1) from role2group rg ,staff_group sg where sg.fdid = rg.group_id and sg.isdeleted='0' and rg.role_id = a.fdid) temp_int2, (select count(1) from role2authority ra ,authority ah where ah.fdid = ra.authority_id and ah.isdeleted='0' and ra.role_id = a.fdid ) temp_int3 from roles a where a.isdeleted='0'
select a.*,(select count(1) from staff2postion sp ,staff sa where sp.staff_id = sa.fdid and sa.isdeleted='0' and sp.postion_id = a.fdid ) temp_int1 from postion a
select a.* from company a where isdeleted='0' connect by a.parent_id = prior a.id start with a.parent_id = #{company_id} order by company_order asc
select * from jobs a where a.isdeleted='0'

select a.fdid,a.staff_number,a.staff_name keyWords, a.staff_number||'-'||staff_name postion_name, cc.company_id from staff a ,staff2company cc where cc.staff_id = a.fdid and a.isdeleted ='0' and cc.company_id in
#{item}
select a.fdid,a.group_name keyWords,group_name desp from staff_group a where a.isdeleted='0'
select a.fdid,a.postion_name keywords ,postion_name desp from postion a
select a.fdid,a.role_name keywords ,role_name desp from roles a where a.isdeleted='0'

select a.fdid,a.company_name keywords,company_name desp from company a where a.isdeleted='0' and fdid in
#{item}

select cc.* from (select a.fdid, a.staff_name keyWords, a.staff_number || '-' ||staff_name desp, staff_number from staff a union select aa.fdid ,aa.group_name keyWords,group_name desp ,'-9' staff_number from staff_group aa union select p.fdid ,p.postion_name keyWords ,postion_name desp ,'-9' staff_number from postion p union select rl.fdid ,rl.role_name keyWords,role_name desp,'-9' staff_number from roles rl union select cp.fdid ,company_name keyWords,cp.company_name desp,'-9' staff_number from company cp ) cc where cc.fdid in
#{item}
mapper.update: update company a set a.company_name = #{company_name},a.parent_id = #{parent_company_id}, company_order = #{company_order},company_address = #{company_address},company_type = #{company_type_id},version_time=sysdate where a.fdid = #{fdid}
update company set isdeleted='1' where fdid =#{fdid}
update staff set staff_name=#{staff_name},phone=#{phone}, version_time =sysdate where fdid = #{fdid}
update staff set isdeleted='1' where fdid = #{fdid}
mapper.select: select a.*,(select cp.company_name from company cp,staff2company scc where scc.company_id = cp.fdid and scc.staff_id = a.fdid) company_name, (select cp.fdid from company cp,staff2company scc where scc.company_id = cp.fdid and scc.staff_id = a.fdid) company_id from staff a where fdid = #{fdid}
select * from staff2role sl,roles rl where rl.fdid = sl.role_id and rl.isdeleted='0' and sl.staff_id = #{fdid}
select * from staff2group sg,staff_group ss where sg.group_id = ss.fdid and ss.isdeleted ='0' and sg.staff_id = #{fdid}
select * from staff2postion sp where sp.staff_id =#{fdid}
select distinct rl.fdid,rl.role_name temp_str1 from roles rl,staff2role sr where sr.role_id = rl.fdid and rl.isdeleted ='0' and sr.staff_id = #{fdid}
select distinct pp.fdid,pp.postion_name temp_str1 from staff2postion sp ,postion pp where pp.fdid = sp.postion_id and sp.staff_id = #{fdid}
select distinct sg.fdid,sg.group_name temp_str1 from staff_group sg ,staff2group s2 where sg.fdid = s2.group_id and sg.isdeleted ='0' and s2.staff_id =#{fdid}
select * from staff a where a.staff_number = #{staff_number} and a.isdeleted='0'
mapper.update: update staff_group set isdeleted='1' where fdid = #{fdid}
mapper.select: select sgg.staff_id,stt.staff_name,sp.group_name from staff2group sgg ,staff stt,staff_group sp where sgg.staff_id = stt.fdid and stt.isdeleted ='0' and sp.fdid = sgg.group_id and sgg.group_id = #{fdid}
mapper.update: update staff_group set group_name=#{group_name} where fdid = #{fdid}
mapper.select: select * from postion a where postion_name=#{postion_name}
select * from staff2postion a where a.postion_id = #{fdid}
mapper.delete: delete from staff2postion a where a.postion_id = #{fdid}
mapper.select: select * from postion a where a.fdid = #{fdid}
mapper.update: update postion set postion_name =#{postion_name},desp=#{desp} where fdid = #{fdid}
mapper.select: select a.fdid,a.menu_name temp_str1 ,a.parent_id from menu a where a.isdeleted='0' union select op.fdid,op.operate_name temp_str1,op.foreign_id parent_id from operation op where op.isdeleted='0' union select pe.fdid,pe.element_name,ep.menu_id parent_id from page_element pe,authority2element ep where ep.element_id = pe.fdid union select a.fdid,a.file_name temp_str1,aa.menu_id parent_id from attachment a ,authority2attachment aa where a.fdid = aa.attachment_id and a.isdeleted='0'

select cc.* from ( select a.fdid,a.menu_name temp_str1 ,a.parent_id from menu a where a.isdeleted='0' union select op.fdid,op.operate_name temp_str1,op.foreign_id parent_id from operation op where op.isdeleted='0' union select pe.fdid,pe.element_name,ep.menu_id parent_id from page_element pe,authority2element ep where ep.element_id = pe.fdid union select a.fdid,a.file_name temp_str1,aa.menu_id parent_id from attachment a ,authority2attachment aa where a.fdid = aa.attachment_id and a.isdeleted='0' ) cc where 1=1 and cc.fdid in
#{item}
select * from flow_dealer a where a.flow_definied_id = #{flowDefinitionId} and a.node_code = #{node_code}
